115043. Borders of Mongolia

Province of Ob — Not random

Conditions

  • Mongolia exists
  • Capital is on continent Europe
  • The following must not occur:
    • Event 115001 - The Manchu alliance and the Buriat Defection for Mongolia has already occurred
  • The following must not occur:
    • Event 115010 - The Manchu alliance and the Buriat Defection for Mongolia has already occurred
  • The following must not occur:
    • Event 115044 - Borders of Mongolia for Tomsk has already occurred

Will happen within 30 days of January 2, 1550
Checked again every 30 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after April 26, 1660)
unless prevented by
Action A of 115044 - Borders of Mongolia for Tomsk

Description

We have reached the borders of Mongolia.

Actions

A. OK

  • Event 115045 - Foreign Colonizers for Mongolia is triggered immediately
  • Event 115044 - Borders of Mongolia for Tomsk will never fire

Back to top

115005. Incorporation of the Buriat in the Steppe

Russia — Not random

Conditions

  • Buryat Horde exists
  • At least one of the following must occur:
    • Event 115003 - The Buriat tribes seek Russian support for Buryat Horde has already occurred
    • Event 115010 - The Manchu alliance and the Buriat Defection for Mongolia has already occurred
  • None of the following must occur:
    • Russia is a vassal of Buryat Horde
    • Buryat Horde and Russia are at war

Will happen within 90 days of January 2, 1582
Checked again every 90 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after April 26, 1660)
unless prevented by
Action B of 115010 - The Manchu alliance and the Buriat Defection for Mongolia
Action B of 115003 - The Buriat tribes seek Russian support for Buryat Horde

Description

When the southern and eastern Mongol tribes threw their lot in with the Manchu, then northern Buriyat Mongols broke with their southern brethrens.

Actions

A. Help Buriyat Mongols crush the local tribes

  • Gain Buryat Horde as vassals
  • Irkutsk will be considered a national province
  • +400 relations with Buryat Horde
  • -250 relations with Mongolia
  • Gain a temporary casus belli against Mongolia for 96 months
  • Irkutsk converts to the state religion
  • -200
  • -20 national manpower
  • +4000 infantry in Novosibirsk
  • +1000 cavalry in Novosibirsk
  • +4000 infantry in Demianka
  • +1000 cavalry in Demianka
  • +4000 infantry in Barabinsk
  • +1000 cavalry in Barabinsk
  • +4000 infantry in Ob
  • +1000 cavalry in Ob
  • +4000 infantry in Tomsk
  • +1000 cavalry in Tomsk
  • +4000 infantry in Angara
  • +1000 cavalry in Angara
  • +4000 infantry in Krasnoyarsk
  • +1000 cavalry in Krasnoyarsk
  • +8000 infantry in Irkutsk
  • +2000 cavalry in Irkutsk
  • Event 115047 - Alliance with Buriat tribes for Russia is triggered immediately

B. No. The Mongols are too strong. We will only give minimal help

  • -75 victory points
  • -50 relations with Buryat Horde
  • +1 badboy
  • Gain Buryat Horde as vassals
  • Gain an alliance with Buryat Horde
  • Irkutsk converts to the state religion

Back to top

115001. The Manchu alliance and the Buriat Defection

Mongolia — Not random

Conditions

  • The following must not occur:
    • Centralization is at 8 or higher
  • Country is not at war
  • The following must not occur:
    • Country has at least 25 non-colonial provinces
  • Russia is a neighbor
  • Manchus exists

Will happen within 400 days of January 2, 1582
Checked again every 400 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after April 26, 1660)
unless prevented by
Action A, B of 115010 - The Manchu alliance and the Buriat Defection for Mongolia

Description

The Mongols and Manchus cooperated substantially in their fight against the Ming Empire, and their close relationship is shown by the incorporation of Mongol nobles and tribes into Manchu government and military ranks. After the unification of the Manchu tribes, the Mongols sought the aid of the Manchu in their long struggle against China. In return for acknowledging the Manchu leader as the 'Great Khan', the Mongols of the steppe gained their alliance and were able to turn the tide against China. The more northern Buriat Mongols did not accept this change, however, and they broke with their southern bretheren. Lacking the power to oppose the Mongol-Manchu alliance on their own, they joined the Russian Empire in stead and crushed local resistance with the help of Russian forces.

Actions

A. Force the northern tribes to acknowledge Manchu overlordship

  • Break vassalization with China
  • Fortress level in Angara -3
  • Fortress level in Krasnoyarsk -3
  • Fortress level in Balakhta -3
  • Fortress level in Tchuma -3
  • Fortress level in Bratsk -3
  • Fortress level in Oka -3
  • Fortress level in Touva -3
  • Fortress level in Saian -3
  • Fortress level in Zima -3
  • Fortress level in Tannu Ola -3
  • Fortress level in Irkutsk -3
  • Fortress level in Chatga -3
  • Fortress level in Selenga -3
  • Fortress level in Ulan Ude -3
  • Fortress level in Buriat -3
  • Fortress level in Tchita -3
  • Fortress level in Kalakan -3
  • Fortress level in Sretensk -3
  • Fortress level in Kalar -3
  • Fortress level in Mogotcha -3
  • Grant independence to Buryat Horde
  • Event 115003 - The Buriat tribes seek Russian support for Buryat Horde is triggered immediately
  • Event 115010 - The Manchu alliance and the Buriat Defection for Mongolia will never fire
  • Event 115009 - Buriat resistance subdued for Mongolia will never fire

B. Acknowledge Buriat tribes and stand alone against all foes

  • Break vassalization with China
  • Break vassalization with Manchus
  • Global revolt risk +3 for 60 months
  • -200 relations with China
  • -200 relations with Manchus
  • -100 relations with Russia
  • Fortress level in Angara -3
  • Fortress level in Krasnoyarsk -3
  • Fortress level in Balakhta -3
  • Fortress level in Tchuma -3
  • Fortress level in Bratsk -3
  • Fortress level in Oka -3
  • Fortress level in Touva -3
  • Fortress level in Saian -3
  • Fortress level in Zima -3
  • Fortress level in Tannu Ola -3
  • Fortress level in Irkutsk -3
  • Fortress level in Chatga -3
  • Fortress level in Selenga -3
  • Fortress level in Ulan Ude -3
  • Fortress level in Buriat -3
  • Fortress level in Tchita -3
  • Fortress level in Kalakan -3
  • Fortress level in Sretensk -3
  • Fortress level in Kalar -3
  • Fortress level in Mogotcha -3
  • Event 115010 - The Manchu alliance and the Buriat Defection for Mongolia will never fire
  • Event 115009 - Buriat resistance subdued for Mongolia will never fire
  • Event 115002 - The incorporation of Mongol tribes for Manchus will never fire
  • Event 115007 - Mongol Refused to join for Manchus is triggered immediately

Back to top

115010. The Manchu alliance and the Buriat Defection

Mongolia — Not random

Conditions

  • Centralization is at 8 or higher
  • Country is not at war
  • The following must not occur:
    • Country has at least 25 non-colonial provinces
  • Russia is a neighbor
  • Manchus exists

Will happen within 400 days of January 2, 1582
Checked again every 400 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after April 26, 1660)
unless prevented by
Action A, B of 115001 - The Manchu alliance and the Buriat Defection for Mongolia

Description

The Mongols and Manchus cooperated substantially in their fight against the Ming Empire, and their close relationship is shown by the incorporation of Mongol nobles and tribes into Manchu government and military ranks. After the unification of the Manchu tribes, the Mongols sought the aid of the Manchu in their long struggle against China. In return for acknowledging the Manchu leader as the 'Great Khan', the Mongols of the steppe gained their alliance and were able to turn the tide against China. The more northern Buriat Mongols did not accept this change, however, and they broke with their southern bretheren. Lacking the power to oppose the Mongol-Manchu alliance on their own, they joined the Russian Empire in stead and crushed local resistance with the help of Russian forces.

Actions

A. Force the northern tribes to acknowledge Manchu overlordship

  • Break vassalization with China
  • Stability -2
  • Revolt risk value in Angara +7
  • Revolt risk value in Tchuma +7
  • Revolt risk value in Oka +7
  • Revolt risk value in Saian +7
  • Revolt risk value in Zima +7
  • Revolt risk value in Irkutsk +7
  • Revolt risk value in Selenga +7
  • Revolt risk value in Buriat +4
  • Revolt risk value in Kalakan +4
  • Global revolt risk +2 for 60 months
  • Fortress level in Angara -3
  • Fortress level in Krasnoyarsk -3
  • Fortress level in Balakhta -3
  • Fortress level in Tchuma -3
  • Fortress level in Bratsk -3
  • Fortress level in Oka -3
  • Fortress level in Touva -3
  • Fortress level in Saian -3
  • Fortress level in Zima -3
  • Fortress level in Tannu Ola -3
  • Fortress level in Irkutsk -3
  • Fortress level in Chatga -3
  • Fortress level in Selenga -3
  • Fortress level in Ulan Ude -3
  • Fortress level in Buriat -3
  • Fortress level in Tchita -3
  • Fortress level in Kalakan -3
  • Fortress level in Sretensk -3
  • Fortress level in Kalar -3
  • Fortress level in Mogotcha -3
  • Event 115001 - The Manchu alliance and the Buriat Defection for Mongolia will never fire

B. Acknowledge Buriat tribes and stand alone against all foes

  • Break vassalization with China
  • Break vassalization with Manchus
  • Global revolt risk +3 for 60 months
  • -200 relations with China
  • -200 relations with Manchus
  • -100 relations with Russia
  • Fortress level in Krasnoyarsk -3
  • Fortress level in Balakhta -3
  • Fortress level in Tchuma -3
  • Fortress level in Bratsk -3
  • Fortress level in Oka -3
  • Fortress level in Touva -3
  • Fortress level in Saian -3
  • Fortress level in Zima -3
  • Fortress level in Tannu Ola -3
  • Fortress level in Irkutsk -3
  • Fortress level in Chatga -3
  • Fortress level in Selenga -3
  • Fortress level in Ulan Ude -3
  • Fortress level in Buriat -3
  • Fortress level in Tchita -3
  • Fortress level in Kalakan -3
  • Fortress level in Sretensk -3
  • Fortress level in Kalar -3
  • Fortress level in Mogotcha -3
  • Event 115001 - The Manchu alliance and the Buriat Defection for Mongolia will never fire
  • Event 115009 - Buriat resistance subdued for Mongolia will never fire
  • Event 115002 - The incorporation of Mongol tribes for Manchus will never fire
  • Event 115005 - Incorporation of the Buriat in the Steppe for Russia will never fire
  • Event 115007 - Mongol Refused to join for Manchus is triggered immediately

115002. The incorporation of Mongol tribes

Manchus — Not random

Conditions

  • Mongolia exists
  • At least one of the following must occur:
    • Event 115001 - The Manchu alliance and the Buriat Defection for Mongolia has already occurred
    • Event 115010 - The Manchu alliance and the Buriat Defection for Mongolia has already occurred
  • None of the following must occur:
    • Manchus is a vassal of Mongolia
    • Mongolia and Manchus are at war

Will happen within 90 days of January 2, 1582
Checked again every 90 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after April 26, 1660)
unless prevented by
Action B of 115010 - The Manchu alliance and the Buriat Defection for Mongolia
Action B of 115001 - The Manchu alliance and the Buriat Defection for Mongolia

Description

The Mongols and Manchus cooperated substantially in their fight against the Ming Empire, and their close relationship is shown by the incorporation of Mongol nobles and tribes into Manchu government and military ranks. After the unification of the Manchu tribes, the Mongols sought the aid of the Manchu in their long struggle against China.

Actions

A. We are the Great Khans of the Mongols!

  • mongol will become an accepted culture
  • Gain Mongolia as vassals
  • +250 relations with Mongolia
  • Event 115046 - Alliance with Mongol tribes for Manchus is triggered immediately

Back to top

115022. More foreign Colonizers

Mongolia — Not random

Conditions

  • The following must not occur:
    • Russia and Mongolia are at war
  • Flag [RussianAdvance1] is set

Will happen within 10 days of January 2, 1582
Checked again every 10 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after December 31, 1819)

Description

More and more foreign colonizers have reached our borders. We are defenseless against them...

Actions

A. Oh no!

  • Fortress level in Krasnoyarsk -3
  • Fortress level in Balakhta -3
  • Fortress level in Tchuma -3
  • Fortress level in Bratsk -3
  • Fortress level in Oka -3
  • Fortress level in Touva -3
  • Fortress level in Saian -3
  • Fortress level in Zima -3
  • Fortress level in Tannu Ola -3
  • Fortress level in Irkutsk -3
  • Fortress level in Chatga -3
  • Fortress level in Selenga -3
  • Fortress level in Ulan Ude -3
  • Fortress level in Buriat -3
  • Fortress level in Tchita -3
  • Fortress level in Kalakan -3
  • Fortress level in Sretensk -3
  • Fortress level in Kalar -3
  • Fortress level in Mogotcha -3
  • Set flag [RussianAdvance2] for events

115021. Russian advance in Eastern Siberia

Mongolia — Not random

Conditions

  • Russia owns Angara
  • Russia controls Touva
  • Russia and Mongolia are at war

Will happen within 10 days of January 2, 1582
Checked again every 10 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after December 31, 1819)

Description

What can we do?

Actions

A. Oh no!

  • Cede Tchuma to Russia
  • Cede Oka to Russia
  • Cede Saian to Russia
  • Cede Zima to Russia
  • Cede Irkutsk to Russia
  • Fortress level in Krasnoyarsk -3
  • Fortress level in Balakhta -3
  • Fortress level in Tchuma -3
  • Fortress level in Bratsk -3
  • Fortress level in Oka -3
  • Fortress level in Touva -3

  • Fortress level in Sretensk -3
  • Fortress level in Kalar -3
  • Fortress level in Mogotcha -3

115009. Buriat resistance subdued

Mongolia — Not random

Conditions

  • Country is not at war
  • At least one of the following must occur:
    • Own Angara
    • Own Tchuma
    • Own Oka
    • Own Saian
    • Own Zima
    • Own Irkutsk
    • Own Selenga
    • Own Kalakan

Will happen within 200 days of January 2, 1670
Checked again every 200 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after December 31, 1819)
unless prevented by
Action B of 115010 - The Manchu alliance and the Buriat Defection for Mongolia
Action A, B of 115001 - The Manchu alliance and the Buriat Defection for Mongolia

Description

Buriat resistance against Manchu overlordship is finally subdued.

Actions

A. Great!

  • Revolt risk value in Angara -7
  • Revolt risk value in Tchuma -7
  • Revolt risk value in Oka -7
  • Revolt risk value in Saian -7
  • Revolt risk value in Zima -7
  • Revolt risk value in Irkutsk -7
  • Revolt risk value in Selenga -7
  • Revolt risk value in Buriat -4
  • Revolt risk value in Kalakan -4

Back to top

115008. Effect of Russian Occupation in Eastern Siberia

Russia — Not random

Conditions

  • Event 115005 - Incorporation of the Buriat in the Steppe for Russia has already occurred
  • At least one of the following must occur:
    • Buryat Horde is a vassal of Russia
    • Russia and Buryat Horde are allied
  • Relations with Buryat Horde are at -100 or higher

Will happen within 200 days of January 2, 1675
Checked again every 200 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after December 31, 1819)

Description

After Russia took control of Buriat and other Mongol lands in Eastern Siberia, major demograhphic changes took place. All Buriat princes were taken in Russian military as officers, and Buriat cavalry crushed local resistance with the help of Russian forces. Many Mongols fled south for fear of ethnic cleansing and others were rigorously assimilated.

Actions

A. Most lands are Russified

  • Inherit the realms of Buryat Horde

Back to top

115031. Mongols Assimilation in Angara

Russia — Not random

Conditions

  • Event 338900 - Effect of Occupation in Eastern Siberia for Angara has already occurred
  • Russia owns Angara
  • At least one of the following must occur:
    • Country is controlled by AI
    • All of the following must occur:
      • Country is controlled by human
      • Angara has religion orthodox

Will happen within 200 days of January 2, 1675
Checked again every 200 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after December 31, 1819)

Description

After Russia took control of the Buriat and other Mongol lands in Eastern Siberia, all of the Buriat princes were taken into the Russian military as officers, the Buriat cavalry crushed local resistance with the help of Russian forces and the Mongols were rigorously assimilated.

Actions

A. OK

  • Culture in Angara changes to russian
  • Angara converts to the state religion

Back to top

  • Selenga converts to the state religion

Back to top

115041. Mongols Assimilation in Sretensk

Russia — Not random

Conditions

  • Event 338910 - Effect of Occupation in Eastern Siberia for Sretensk has already occurred
  • Russia owns Sretensk
  • At least one of the following must occur:
    • Country is controlled by AI
    • All of the following must occur:
      • Country is controlled by human
      • Sretensk has religion orthodox

Will happen within 200 days of January 2, 1675
Checked again every 200 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after December 31, 1819)

Description

After Russia took control of the Buriat and other Mongol lands in Eastern Siberia, all of the Buriat princes were taken into the Russian military as officers, the Buriat cavalry crushed local resistance with the help of Russian forces and the Mongols were rigorously assimilated.

Actions

A. OK

  • Culture in Sretensk changes to russian
  • Sretensk converts to the state religion

Back to top

115047. Alliance with Buriat tribes

Russia — Not random

Triggered by

Action A of 115005 - Incorporation of the Buriat in the Steppe for Russia

Description

Lacking the power to oppose the Mongol-Manchu alliance on their own, the northern Buriyat Mongols joined the Russian Empire. All Buriat princes were taken in Russian military as officers, and Buriat cavalry crushed local resistance with the help of Russian forces.

Actions

A. Good!

  • Gain an alliance with Buryat Horde
  • Start a war with Mongolia

115045. Foreign Colonizers

Mongolia — Not random

Conditions

  • The following must not occur:
    • Centralization is at 8 or higher
  • The following must not occur:
    • Country has at least 25 non-colonial provinces

Triggered by

Action A of 115043 - Borders of Mongolia for Ob
Action A of 115044 - Borders of Mongolia for Tomsk

Description

Foreign colonizers have reached our borders. They covet our lands but we are defenseless against them...

Actions

A. Damn!

  • Fortress level in Angara -3
  • Fortress level in Krasnoyarsk -3
  • Fortress level in Balakhta -3
  • Fortress level in Tchuma -3
  • Fortress level in Bratsk -3
  • Fortress level in Oka -3
  • Fortress level in Touva -3
  • Fortress level in Saian -3
  • Fortress level in Zima -3
  • Fortress level in Tannu Ola -3
  • Fortress level in Irkutsk -3
  • Fortress level in Chatga -3
  • Fortress level in Selenga -3
  • Fortress level in Ulan Ude -3
  • Fortress level in Buriat -3
  • Fortress level in Tchita -3
  • Fortress level in Kalakan -3
  • Fortress level in Sretensk -3
  • Fortress level in Kalar -3
  • Fortress level in Mogotcha -3

115007. Mongol Refused to join

Manchus — Not random

Triggered by

Action B of 115010 - The Manchu alliance and the Buriat Defection for Mongolia
Action B of 115001 - The Manchu alliance and the Buriat Defection for Mongolia

Description

The Mongols and Manchus cooperated substantially in their fight against the Ming Empire, and their close relationship is shown by the incorporation of Mongol nobles and tribes into Manchu government and military ranks. After the unification of the Manchu tribes, the Mongols sought the aid of the Manchu in their long struggle against China. In return for acknowledging the Manchu leader as the 'Great Khan', the Mongols of the steppe gained their alliance and were able to turn the tide against China.

Actions

A. They betrayed our previous cooperation

  • Gain a temporary casus belli against Mongolia for 72 months
  • -200 relations with Mongolia

Back to top

115003. The Buriat tribes seek Russian support

Buryat Horde — Not random

Triggered by

Action A of 115001 - The Manchu alliance and the Buriat Defection for Mongolia

Description

When the southern and eastern Mongol tribes threw their lot in with the Manchu, then northern Buriyat Mongols broke with their southern brethrens. Lacking the power to oppose the Mongol-Manchu alliance on their own, they joined the Russian Empire instead. All Buriat princes were taken in Russian military as officers, and Buriat cavalry crushed local resistance with the help of Russian forces.

Actions

A. Join the Russian empire and crush the local opposition

  • Break vassalization with Mongolia
  • Change religion to orthodox
  • +400 relations with Russia
  • Land tech investment: +5000
  • Trade tech investment: +1000
  • Infrastructure tech investment: +1000
  • -200 relations with Mongolia
  • Start a war with Mongolia
  • Stability -1
  • Global revolt risk +4 for 60 months
  • Move capital to Tchuma
  • Cede Irkutsk to Russia
  • Irkutsk will no longer be considered a national province
  • -20 national manpower
  • +4000 infantry in Angara
  • +1000 cavalry in Angara
  • +4000 infantry in Tchuma
  • +1000 cavalry in Tchuma
  • +4000 infantry in Oka
  • +1000 cavalry in Oka
  • +4000 infantry in Saian
  • +1000 cavalry in Saian

B. Stand alone against all threats

  • Break vassalization with Mongolia
  • Stability -2
  • -100 relations with Russia
  • -200 relations with Mongolia
  • -10 national manpower
  • +10000 cavalry in Irkutsk
  • +1500 infantry in Irkutsk
  • Start a war with Mongolia
  • Fortress level in Angara -3
  • Fortress level in Tchuma -3
  • Fortress level in Oka -3
  • Fortress level in Saian -3
  • Fortress level in Zima -3
  • Fortress level in Irkutsk -3
  • Fortress level in Selenga -3
  • Event 115005 - Incorporation of the Buriat in the Steppe for Russia will never fire
